messages.message:
Hi everyone, there will be a very brief period of downtime for Sandbox Console today at 4pm EST while we rebuild some DB projections. This will only affect the sandbox manager page (https://sandbox.console.instabase.com/sandbox) and should take no more than 10 minutes. All other pages (including the sandbox details pages) will still be available, so if there’s a sandbox you think you might need to access during this time I recommend that you bookmark its page or store the URL somewhere.

I’ll update this thread when maintenance starts and when it ends, thanks!
Had some delays, rebuilding projection now
Maintenance is complete on Sandbox Console, sorry it took longer than expected!
